description: Tottenham: Welcome to a Spurs Q&A with BBC Sport
title: Welcome to a Spurs Q&A
title_page: Tottenham: Welcome to a Spurs Q&A with BBC Sport - BBC Sport
maintext:
We asked you to submit your pre-season questions for an insider view on Tottenham.
Over the course of Monday, BBC Radio 5 Live's George Cummins will be combing through them and giving his take on how this season is shaping up for Spurs.
